edu.uga.dawgtrades.model

Interface ExperienceReport

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persistable

    public interface ExperienceReport
extends Persistable
    This interface represents an ExperienceReport filed by a RegisteredUser (reviewer) on a different RegisteredUser (reviewed). It has a collection of methods to read/write ExperienceReport's attributes. It also extends the Persistable interface, since objects of this class will be stored in the persistent data store.

               throws DTException
